meanings.definition: A type of strong, cold wind in the Mediterranean region.
meanings.sent1: The boras blew fiercely across the sea, making the waves crash against the shore.
meanings.sent2: During winter, the boras can bring freezing temperatures to the coastal areas.
meanings.sent3: The boras wind was so strong that it blew away all the laundry hanging outside.
meanings.sent4: The boras swept through the town like an invisible giant, chilling everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the howling sound of the boras as it roared through the night.

meanings.definition: A type of thick, knotted fringe used as a decoration on clothing or textiles.
meanings.sent1: Her scarf was adorned with colorful boras that swayed with her every movement.
meanings.sent2: The traditional dress was embellished with intricate boras that added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent3: The boras on the pillow looked like playful little tassels dancing in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a queen wearing a gown adorned with golden boras that shimmered in the light.
meanings.sent5: The boras on the tapestry seemed to come alive, creating a mesmerizing effect.
